knimeNode.name: Image Column Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes all in a column images to a directory.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes all images in a certain column of the input table and writes them, each as a separate file, into a directory in the file system. The files will be named after the table's row keys.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the image cells here.
Choose if existing files should be overwritten here. If this option is unchecked, the node will fail if a file already exists.

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one Image column.
